def on_start(container):
    phantom.debug('on_start() called')
    
    # call 'geolocate_ip_2' block
    geolocate_ip_2(container=container)

    return

cells.block_code:
def send_email_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None):
    phantom.debug('send_email_1() called')
    
    #phantom.debug('Action: {0} {1}'.format(action['name'], ('SUCCEEDED' if success else 'FAILED')))
    
    name_value = container.get('name', None)

    # collect data for 'send_email_1' call
    results_data_1 = phantom.collect2(container=container, datapath=['geolocate_ip_2:action_result.data.*.country_name', 'geolocate_ip_2:action_result.parameter.context.artifact_id'], action_results=results)
    inputs_data_1 = phantom.collect2(container=container, datapath=['geolocate_ip_2:artifact:*.cef.destinationUserName', 'geolocate_ip_2:artifact:*.id'], action_results=results)

    parameters = []
    
    # build parameters list for 'send_email_1' call
    for results_item_1 in results_data_1:
        for inputs_item_1 in inputs_data_1:
            if inputs_item_1[0] and results_item_1[0]:
                parameters.append({
                    'from': "donotreply@splunk.com",
                    'to': inputs_item_1[0],
                    'cc': "",
                    'bcc': "",
                    'subject': name_value,
                    'body': results_item_1[0],
                    'attachments': "",
                    'headers': "",
                    # context (artifact id) is added to associate results with the artifact
                    'context': {'artifact_id': inputs_item_1[1]},
                })

    phantom.act("send email", parameters=parameters, assets=['smtp'], name="send_email_1", parent_action=action)

    return
cells.name: send email
cells.title: Generic
